testcase.name: Testing an empty string should return cero
Testing one number, should return the same number
Testing two numbers, should return the sum of numbers
Testing any numbers, should return the sum of numbers
Testing any numbers with new lines between them, should return the sum of numbers
Testing any numbers with new lines between them, should return the sum of numbers
Testing negative numbers in the string, should return message error
